column4: Latest;Sihanoukville Province: The Team of the Coastal Commission of the Administration of Preah Sihanouk Provincial Hall dismantled a Chinese steel structure located on Otres 1 in Sihanoukville.------The massive dismantling operation on the illegal construction began on July 8
column6: according to officials. Two structures were pulled down.------Preah Sihanouk administration officials confirmed that the two buildings had been illegally constructed and affected the environment.------The construction site
column8: has previously been closed down and the owner given the choice to dismantle it on his own. The construction owner continued to build
column9: ignoring the instructions of the authorities until the team arrived on July 8th and did the work instead. ------https://kbn.news/archives/127683
